subject: Management
title: Reframing Statements
description: A fast breakdown of Reframing Statements for builders.

hook.text: He said: you never listen. The mediator rephrased: it sounds like you'd like to feel more heard.

buildup.text: Accusatory language escalates. Reframing translates attacks into needs.

discovery.text: Reframing takes a hostile statement and restates it as a legitimate concern or need.

twist.text: The content doesn't change. But the emotional charge drops dramatically.

climax.text: Practice: you're so controlling becomes you'd like more autonomy in how you approach this.

punchline.text: Same message, different frame. That's where resolution starts.

quiz.question: What does reframing accomplish in mediation?
options: It translates hostile accusations into legitimate needs
It changes the subject to avoid the actual conflict
It proves one person's perspective is more valid
